body_html:
Hi @amutu
I have followed your amazing introduction of how to install offline tensorflow.
But now I have one more question...
When I try to view the data flow graph through tensorboard
It seems the browser(firefox) keeps trying to download something from website (google?)
And after waiting for a long time (~5mins), it still can't show anything from my browser.
I was wondering if there is anyway to run tensorboard with internet connection..
Thanks for your help in advance!
